enWisdom: By repeated thinking [and contemplation], doubt is dispelled
By repeated thinking the outcomes become sound

Wisdom: طُولُ الْفِكْرِ يَحْمَدُ الْعَوَاقِبَ وَيَسْتَدْرِكُ فَسَادَ الْأُمُورِ
enWisdom: Lengthy contemplation makes the end results praiseworthy and prevents the corruption of matters
Lengthy consideration equals [benefitting from] the opinion of the advisor
One whose thinking is prolonged, his observation becomes good
One whose thinking increases, his end result becomes good

Wisdom: مَنْ أَكْثَرَ الْفِكْرَ فِيمَا تَعَلَّمَ [يَعْلَمُ‏] أَتْقَنَ عِلْمَهُ وَفَهِمَ مَا لَمْ يَكُنْ يَفْهَمُ
enWisdom: One who increases his reflection about what he has learnt safeguards his knowledge and understands that which he would not have [otherwise] understood
One whose thought is prolonged, his discernment becomes good
